org.resthub.core.dao

Interface GenericDao<T,ID extends Serializable>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.synyx.hades.dao.GenericDao<T,ID>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AbstractPermissionsOwnerDao, PermissionsOwnerDao<T>, RoleDao, UserDao
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPermissionsOwnerDaoImpl, JpaGroupDao, JpaUserDao, RoleDaoImpl

    public interface GenericDao<T,ID extends Serializable>
extends org.synyx.hades.dao.GenericDao<T,ID>
    Generic Dao that can manage any kind of entities. Extends Hades GenericDao.
    See Also:
    Hades 2.0 Javadoc
